attributes.action: scrap plans to introduce a national database supposedly to improve public services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are already under more physical and statistical surveillance than any other population in the world . This latest "initiative" is a step too far. Only a fool would believe the purpose of this is to improve public services. We are getting to stage soon where we we will have no privacy from the prying eyes of government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
